title: Why won't Spectrum Mobile allow pixel 4a on their network?
content: I have used my Pixel 4a on two Verizon MNVO's - Visible and Red Pocket.  However, Spectrum Mobile claims that it won't work on their system, which is also an MNVO.  Why would that be?  What does Spectrum mobile need access to on the phone that Red Pocket and Visible don't?
